description: This file defines the route component for viewing and editing a note's details in a Remix-based React application. It includes server-side loader and action functions for fetching, updating, and deleting notes, as well as the React component for rendering the note editing UI.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches the note data based on the route parameter id, after authenticating the user. Redirects to login if not authenticated.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submissions to save or delete a note, performing authentication, and redirects after deleting. Updates note data on save.
